column3: and when you started back up
column4: you started with auxiliary power.”|Jurassic Park|Michael Crichton

column2: I stared at my alarm clock until it became a blemish
column3: its red hue glowing like a welcome sign beckoning me into the depths of hell's crimson-colored cavities. 5:13 am. To describe this Monday as a blue Monday was an understatement.|Uptempo|Nakia D Johnson
